abstract: I.S.S says, “This board may have achieved what no other board has managed in at least four decades: make Carl Icahn look like a victim.”
snippet: I.S.S says, “This board may have achieved what no other board has managed in at least four decades: make Carl Icahn look like a victim.”
lead_paragraph: I.S.S. decided to split the baby.

headline.main: Icahn Wins Partial Nod in Lions Gate Fight
